name: Stern Warning
desc:
Harsh winds pick up and strike at a 30 foot cube centered within a point in range that you can see. Creatures must make a Dexterity saving throw or take 2d6 bludgeoning damage.

Creatures that take damage from this spell are vulnerable to the damage dealt from your next Wind spell cast before the end of your next turn.
empower: Area increased to a 40 foot cube.
author: CrusaderDroid
